name: 2ND INTERDISCIPLINARY RESEARCH, INNOVATION AND POSTGRADUATE CONFERENCE 2017
content: The conference intends to bring researchers, postgraduate students and academics across the region to exchange ideas in the following disciplines: Accounting and Management Sciences Arts and Design Basic and Applied Sciences Engineering and Information Technology Health Sciences We welcome you to Durban, the largest city in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal. It is the second most populous city in South Africa after Johannesburg. It is with great pleasure that the Postgraduate Association and the Directorate for Research and Postgraduate Support at the Durban University of Technology hosts the 2nd Interdisciplinary Research and Postgraduate Conference. Twenty-five (25) best peer-reviewed full papers will be published in the Interdisciplinary Journal of Economics and Business Law (IJEBL) as a special issue. The special issue is expected to have been published, at least, 2-3 months after the Conference. Please, refer to the folder “important dates” for the deadline of submission of full paper. Publishing of full papers in this special issue is optional. Full papers will only be considered for review after registration fee has been paid. Enquiries: PGA@dut.ac.za
